english.segment1: You're arriving with the sound of thunder and rain. You're arriving in the calm of the wind and the waves. You're arriving in the glow of a burning flame. A burning flame
english.segment2: Praise awaits You at the dawn when the world come alive. Praise awaits You in the darkness and shines in the light. Praise awaits You with a song of love and desire, love and desire
english.segment3: Here comes the King. All bow down. Lift up your voices. Unto the Lamb. He is the King. All bow down. All bow down
english.segment4: You are coming again like a thief in the night. You are coming again with a shout from the sky. You are coming again to take away Your bride. To take away Your bride
english.segment6: You are the King. All bow down. We lift up our voices. Unto the Lamb. You are the King
